title: Twice as Good, Ten Times as Happy
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Here’s your pork bun, Rin-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Alright. Thank you nya, Riko-san! Thanks for the food!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I’ll have a bite too.... Mmn~, so good.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>What did you get, Riko-san?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>I got the cheese curry bun.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>That sounds tasty nya~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Would you like half?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Eh, are you sure!? Then, you can have half of mine too nya! Here you go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Okay, thanks. Then.... here’s mine.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Yaaay~! *Munch*.... It’s delicious nya~! Look, the cheese is so stretchy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Fufu, the pork bun also tastes great.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0005/>Sharing multiple flavors of food with your friends is the best nya! It makes them twice as good!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>It may be only twice as good, but I feel ten times as happy right now!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
